original: Lindmark, Oscar Emanuel, kyrkoherde, Östra Stenby, f. 27/3/97 i Helsingfors, Finl., av dir. Axel L. o. Clary Blackwood. G. 21 m. Elisabeth Sjögren. Barn: Marianne f. 22, Birgitta 24, Axel 26. — Studrex. i Sthlm 16, fil. kand. i Upps. 21, teoi. kand., prakt, teoil. prov o. prästv. f. Linköp. stift 28. Missionär i Indien 21-24, v. kom-min. i Östra Ed 28-30, kommin. i Sö-derala 30-33, kyrkoh. i Östra Stenby o. Konungsund sed. 33. Ordf. i kyrkostämmor, fattigv :styr., skolråd, barnav.nd, boställsstyr., kontr :ombud f. Sv. kyrkans miss. o. sjömansvård.
translated: Lindmark, Oscar Emanuel, clergyman, Östra Stenby, born on March 27, 1897 in Helsinki, Finland, son of director Axel L. and Clary Blackwood. Married on September 21 with Elisabeth Sjögren. Children: Marianne, born in 1922, Birgitta, born in 1924, Axel, born in 1926. Completed studies in Stockholm in 1916, received a Bachelor of Arts degree in Uppsala in 1921, completed theological studies and passed the practical and theoretical exams for priesthood in the diocese of Linköping in 1928. Missionary in India from 1921 to 1924, assistant curate in Östra Ed from 1928 to 1930, curate in Söderala from 1930 to 1933, parish priest in Östra Stenby and Konungsund since 1933. Chairman of church assemblies, poor relief board, school council, child welfare board, parsonage board, representative for Swedish church missions and seamen's welfare.

education.description: Practical and theoretical exams for priesthood
